column49: We need to know the limits so that as heaothcare professionals personal interaction and counselling should not be substituted by artificial intelligence.  Humans are created to interact and machines should enhance our work but not a substitute yo our profession. We should not get to a point where patients accessing LLMs will feel they do not need the health professionals anymore.  There are cars to make life easy, there are traffic lights and police to still guide driving.
